content:
Hi There,

I recently sent the FHIR "Categorized Resource" page to someone who is investigating use. They came back with the question: "Is there a place that I can find the definitions of the Resource Categories". I have this memory of having read them at some point, but I can't seem to locate the definitions.

Here is the page I am referring to: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/resourcelist.html

Any help locating the resource category definitions used would be quite helpful!

Example: Base, Specialized, Financial, Clinical
The categories are somewhat arbitrary. We have module descriptions on the home page that correspond to some of the category labels, but not all.
